name: Contruct (glitch object #019)
description: This is a panoramic glitch of Diego Velasquez' Las Meninas. As the painting itself is known to have pioneered newer ways of seeing, I want to use the gesture of glitch as a mode of critique into perceiving the usual. As with all things in society, often what is deemed normal is only the imposed "usual". In a way I want to use the act of glitching as a mode to question these baggages in perception.
